Dataset of JOBS03 SIC codes and food chain sectors

jobs03_sectors.Rd

The 'official' SIC definition of the food chain that Defra uses is described in the pocketbook glossary. This dataset uses the SIC codes included in JOBS03. It is useful to join against raw JOBS03 data to extract food sectors of interest.

Usage

jobs03_sectors(include_fishing = TRUE, include_total = TRUE)

Arguments

include_fishing

logical: include the definition of the fishing industry

include_total

logical: include the definition of total UK industry

Value

A tibble of SIC codes and sectors.

See also

Other JOBS03: acquire_jobs03(), get_jobs03(), jobs03_AUK_sectors()

Examples

jobs03_sectors()
#> # A tibble: 12 × 2
#>    sector         sic_division
#>    <chr>          <chr>       
#>  1 Manufacturing  10.1-5      
#>  2 Manufacturing  10.6-8      
#>  3 Manufacturing  10.9        
#>  4 Manufacturing  11-12       
#>  5 Wholesale      46.30       
#>  6 Retail         47.20       
#>  7 Retail         47.11       
#>  8 Catering       56.10       
#>  9 Catering       56.20       
#> 10 Catering       56.30       
#> 11 Fishing        03          
#> 12 All Industries 01-98
